20110114221011.000|20110114221013.000|TR0|RHEE:  Well, it's hard to say what's going 
20110114221013.000|20110114221015.000|TR0|to happen in three months.  I -- I would 
20110114221015.000|20110114221017.000|TR0|say that she's going to continue to get 
20110114221017.000|20110114221019.000|TR0|better compared to today.  There might be 
20110114221019.000|20110114221021.000|TR0|time periods when she takes a few steps

20110114222930.000|20110114222932.000|TR0|of an orderly process, and they -- and I

20110114223120.000|20110114223123.000|TR0|Seventy-six-year-old Mavy Stoddard says

20110114223125.000|20110114223127.000|TR0|fairy tale.

20110114223135.000|20110114223137.000|TR0|

20110114223144.000|20110114223146.000|TR0|widowed, both had raised four children.
